title: Slider host URI
desc: URI that points to the host.

title: Slider mode
desc: Change both layout and hwinfo data. (default: diva)

title: Override LED diffuser
desc: Whether or not to force the LED diffuser on/off. (default: auto)

title: X collision overlap
desc: Overlap between the collision box of nearby electrodes on horizontal axis (in millimeters) (default: 6.0)

title: Y collision overlap
desc: Overlap between the collision box of nearby electrodes on vertical axis (in millimeters) (default: 6.0)

title: LED gamma
desc: Set gamma correction value for the emulated slider LED (gamma = 1.0: no correction; gamma > 1.0: darker than raw value; 0.0 < gamma < 1.0: brighter than raw value) (default: 0.5)

title: LED diffuser blur width
desc: Set the width of the Gaussian blur LED diffuser (if applicable) (default: 16.0)
